channel.title: Need help please try ur BEST to explaineeee plz
channel.description:
Okay i have downloaded an source and i wanted to compile it and it said the system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue....
what do i do to fix that?
I have the newest java. and here is the edit thing,
@echo off title Compiling... cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java pause
What should i do?

[quote=“Destroyed 32, post:6, topic:261807”]Do you have TeamViewer? When yes, start it and send me the Informations (ID and Pass) over a PM to me

Than i help you :)[/quote]
TeamViewer owns. XD
